Joseph Solomon
==============

[City Council](https://www.killeentexas.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=7)
Title: Councilmember District #2
Phone:
254-423-0737
[Email Joseph Solomon](mailto:jsolomon@killeentexas.gov)

Joseph Solomon Sr. is a military veteran who brings a unique perspective and a strong sense of duty to his community service. His commitment to serving others is evident by his extensive track record of over 35 years advocating for community advancement and betterment.

Joseph served as an Executive Director of the Refuge Corporation, which gave him the opportunity to collaborate with various community organizations, city officials, and community leaders. This collaborative approach has allowed him to address a wide range of community concerns and issues, including homelessness, women's and men's shelters, drug abuse and addictions, and support for schools and students.

One of the pressing issues that Joseph recognizes is food insecurity and the presence of food deserts in his community. He understands that access to nutritious and affordable food is essential for the well-being of individuals and families. To address this challenge, Joseph actively collaborates with community organizations, city and school officials to develop sustainable solutions. He believes in creating opportunities for local residents to have access to fresh and healthy food options.

He has served as a council member in Copperas Cove, and as a an Elder for his church, where he provides spiritual guidance and support to families, couples, and individuals, recognizing the importance of addressing not only physical needs but also emotional and spiritual well-being.

In his free time, Joseph enjoys spending quality time with his family, engaging in activities that promote personal growth and spiritual development, and reading. These activities not only recharge him but also contribute to his ability to effectively serve and lead within the community.
